about_the_game:
Build, Manage, and Explore in a Cozy Pirate Paradise!

Welcome to Isle of Pirates, a charming and atmospheric game where you step into the boots of a pirate-turned-entrepreneur. Start with nothing and build your dream tavern and motel on a lush tropical island surrounded by crystal-clear waters and dense coconut forests.

Key Features:

Tavern & Motel Management: Construct and customize your tavern and motel to attract travelers and adventurers. Serve drinks, provide lodging, and grow your reputation!

Explore the Seas: Set sail to discover mysterious islands, ancient relics, and valuable trade opportunities.

Gather Resources: Fish, hunt, and chop trees to gather materials for crafting and upgrading your establishment.

Craft & Build: Design the perfect tavern and create unique items to enhance your services.

Defend Your Island: Protect your island from attackers and rival pirates looking to plunder your hard-earned treasures.

Thriving Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a vibrant, colorful world filled with charming characters and engaging activities.

Whether you're serving drinks in your cozy tavern, embarking on an adventurous sea voyage, or protecting your island from dangers, Isle of Pirates offers endless opportunities for fun and creativity. Are you ready to craft your legacy in this pirate paradise?

  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200U/ Intel Core i3-10110U
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 3/Intel UHD Graphics

short_description: Isle of Pirates is a casual tavern and motel management game where you build, manage and defend your business on a tropical island. Explore other islands, trade, fish, hunt, craft and create your dream pirate paradise in a stunning world!
